snippet.title: Great Houses of Calderia - Early Access Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy Great Houses of Calderia on Steam in Early Access: http://steam.gs/l/97m23/youtube
Great Houses of Calderia is available NOW in Early Access 20% on Steam!

Achieve your goal in this Feudal Grand Strategy by choosing diplomacy, intrigue, war, and economy. Manage your fiefdom and assign tasks to your characters. Make allies, enemies, trade, arrange marriages, and appeal for the most useful rank to achieve objectives.

Build your legacy of power and rise in the ranks of Calderia by any means necessary. Explore the intricacies of the politics of this Mediterranean Renaissance-inspired world.

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/vsxD6n8P8J

Great Houses of Calderia:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/CalderiaGame
Steam page -  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812910/Great_Houses_of_Calderia
Official website - https://calderiagames.com

Firesquid:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/FiresquidGames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/FiresquidGames
Official website - https://www.firesquid.fr

Resistance Games:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/resistancegames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/GamesResistance
Official website - https://resistancegames.com

--------------------------------------------

Music:
Great Houses of Calderia Theme
Janne Kariniemi & Seppo Kantonen

Trailer:
Suzanne Wallace (Indie Bard)
https://www.indiebard.co
